title: Verify: Selecting WWE Network Channel successfully opens WWE Network
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Xbox device
AND has gone to the "Xbox Live"
AND has added the "WWE Network" Channel
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the "WWE Network" Channel from the Xbox menu
custom_expected: THEN the "WWE Network" will open successfully

title: Verify: User receives an access gate if they have not logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Xbox device
AND the Xbox device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND the user has not previously accessed the channel
custom_steps: WHEN the WWE Network channel is access
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive an access gate
AND we will be unable to continue without first logging in

title: Verify: User will NOT receive an access gate if they have previously logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Xbox device
AND the Xbox device is currently connected to an Internet connection
AND the "WWE Network" channel is installed
AND we have already logged into the WWE Network with an account
custom_steps: WHEN we access the WWE Network channel from the main Xbox screen
custom_expected:
THEN the access gate will not be encountered
AND the user will be brought to the Home screen

title: Verify ON NOW/Linear presentation of VOD program is not bookmarked
custom_preconds: ON NOW program should not already be in the current user test account's Watchlist or Continue Watching list.
custom_steps:
1. Note ON NOW program.
2. Launch ON NOW > NOW
3. Let play for 10+ seconds.
4. Exit via BACK.
custom_expected:
Current program should not appear in:

1. HOME carousel Watchlist/Continue Watching
1. MY ACCOUNT Watchlist/Continue Watching

title: Verify ON NOW/Watch From Beginning presentation of VOD program is bookmarked
custom_preconds: ON NOW program should not already be in the current user test account's Watchlist or Continue Watching list.
custom_steps:

2. Launch ON NOW > FROM BEGINNING
3. Let play for 10+ seconds.
4. Exit via BACK.
custom_expected:

HOME carousel Watchlist/Continue Watching
MY ACCOUNT Watchlist/Continue Watching

[Note: Improvements logged in JIRA to address limits of ON NOW/From Beginning launch when bookmarked program is currently playing]

custom_expected:

1. HOME carousel Watchlist/Continue Watching
1. MY ACCOUNT Watchlist/Continue Watching

title: Verify enabling parental controls will hide (yet preserve) restricted content from user’s Continue Watching list in Home Carousel
custom_preconds: Test account should be set with parental controls OFF and ONLY ONE TV-14 or higher rated item in Continue Watching.
custom_steps:
1. Confirm TV-14 or higher item appear in Continue Watching carousel thumb.
2. Quit app.
3. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls ON" and save settings.
4. Relaunch XB1.
5. Confirm TV-14 or higher Continue Watching carousel item does not appear.
6. Quit app.
7. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls OFF" and save settings.
8. Relaunch XB1.
9. Confirm TV-14 or higher Continue Watching carousel item appears as expected as seen in step 1.
custom_expected: Enabling parental controls will hide restricted content from user’s Continue Watching on Home Carousel and disabling enabling parental controls will reveal the same content.

title: Verify enabling parental controls will hide (yet preserve) restricted content from user’s Watchlist in Home Carousel
custom_preconds: Test account should be set with parental controls OFF and ONLY ONE TV-14 or higher rated item in Watchlist.
custom_steps:
1. Confirm TV-14 or higher item appears in Watchlist carousel thumb.
2. Quit app.
3. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls ON" and save settings.
4. Relaunch XB1.
5. Confirm TV-14 or higher Watchlist carousel item does not appear.
6. Quit app.
7. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls OFF" and save settings.
8. Relaunch XB1.
9. Confirm TV-14 or higher Watchlist carousel item appears as expected as seen in step 1.
custom_expected: Enabling parental controls will hide restricted content from user’s Watchlist on Home Carousel and disabling enabling parental controls will reveal the same content.

title: Continue Watching: Verify launching a VOD and exiting playback before the end adds the content to the Continue Watching List
custom_preconds: Only video launched as VOD should create bookmarks to resume at a later time. To verify this is working as expected, launching from Shows lists, Schedule, Home screen and any video launched from Search (milestones).
custom_steps:
1. Go to Shows and select:
a. PPV > WWE, ECW or WCW > (select a year)
b. In- Ring
c. Originals
d. Vault
2. Select a show that has not been viewed before and Select PLAY
3. Video launches (preroll and bumpers play); let playback continue for at least 15 seconds
4. Back out of video
5. Confirm Show launch screen displays Progress bar representative of amount watched and that RESUME button replaces PLAY
6. Note the show and progress
7. Go to MY ACCOUNT and select CONTINUE WATCHING
custom_expected: The video launched and viewed in steps 2-4 displays in the CONTINUE WATCHING list.

title: Continue Watching: Verify launching a VOD and exiting playback before the end; 'Continue Watching' thumbnail displays on Home

4. Back out of video
5. Confirm Show launch screen displays Progress bar representative of amount watched and that RESUME button replaces PLAY

title: Verify app allows only one Bookmark per Video Program

3. Back out of video
4. Verify correct progress bar positioning seen in Show Launch page 
5. Activate Resume Playback
6. Verify correct progress bar positioning seen in playhead

11. Verify correct progress bar positioning seen in playhead

title: Verify Milestone View sets appropriate bookmark
custom_preconds: Start at Search Page - app must have confirmed "Add Milestone" functionality.
custom_steps:
1. Search for a Milestone
2. Activate a Milestone result (as opposed to an Episode return)
3. From Milestone Launch page, activate Add To Watchlist
4. Activate Play Milestone note time in playhead & let video play for 10 + seconds
5. Jump to My Account > Continue Watching
6. Identify recently added Milestone's program and activate Resume Playback
7. Confirm time launched from is as expected from step 2
8. Seek >10+ mins and let play for >10sec, note time in playhead
9. Back out of video
10. Nav to Watchlist > Episodes
11. Identify recently added Milestone (same as added in step 2 and played back in step 6) & activate
12. Confirm time launched from is as expected from step 2
custom_expected: Bookmarking is overridden by Milestone Launch. In step 12, app should never playback from bookmark set in step 8.

title: Verify Bookmarks are consistent and accessible on all devices
custom_preconds:
Xbox One and a different platform must be used in this test.

- XB1 on Show Launch of unseen program.
- Other device on any page other than Home.
- Both devices logged in to same account.
custom_steps:
1. Launch video.
2. Seek >5 mins and note time.
3. Exit via Back.
4. In under 5 seconds, use other device to nav to Home > Continue Watching > 1st time in list and launch Resume Playback
5. Confirm 2nd device plays back same program from step 1 and from time noted in step 2
6. While playback ensues, return to Xbox One and nav to Continue Watching, highlighting 1st item in list
7. Return to device 2, seek >5 mins and note time.
8. Exit via Back.
9. In under 5 seconds, use XB1 to activate 1st item in list and then launch Resume Playback
10. Confirm XB1 plays back same program from step 1 and from time noted in step 7
custom_expected: Bookmarks will be synched across devices fast enough to support switching use case (under 5 seconds between closing one and opening the other app).

title: Verify enabling parental controls will hide (yet preserve) restricted content from user’s Series Watchlists
custom_preconds: Test account should be set with parental controls OFF and Watchlist populated with at least one TV-14 or higher rated item in Series.
custom_steps:
1. Confirm TV-14 or higher Watchlist items appear in Series LVLs 1 & 2 - record list.
2. Quit app.
3. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls ON" and save settings.
4. Relaunch XB1.
5. Nav to Watchlist > Series and confirm TV-14 or higher Watchlist items do not appear.
6. Quit app.
7. Through user account (via WWE Network site) change account to "Parental Controls OFF" and save settings.
8. Relaunch XB1.
9. Nav to Watchlist > Episodes and confirm TV-14 or higher Watchlist items appear as expected as seen in step 1.
custom_expected:
Enabling parental controls will hide restricted content from user’s Series Watchlists and disabling enabling parental controls will reveal the same content.

Note that some Series will have varying content ratings within (i.e. Legends' House) that will hide some and reveal others within LVL 2 of Episodes. In these cases, whole Series should not be hidden.
